mapper.sql: id, title, operate_period, fee, privilege_level, bussiness_scop, bussiness_area_title, bussiness_area_code, organ, sign_text, `state`, pub_time, end_time, pay_evidence
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from org_licence
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into org_licence (id, title, operate_period, fee, privilege_level, bussiness_scop, bussiness_area_title, bussiness_area_code, organ, sign_text, `state`, pub_time, end_time, pay_evidence ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{privilegeLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bussinessScop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bussinessAreaTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bussinessAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pubTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payEvidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into org_licence
id,
title,
operate_period,
fee,
privilege_level,
bussiness_scop,
bussiness_area_title,
bussiness_area_code,
organ,
sign_text,
`state`,
pub_time,
end_time,
pay_evidence,

#{operatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fee,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update org_licence
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_period = #{record.operatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fee = #{record.fee,jdbcType=BIGINT},
privilege_level = #{record.privilegeLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bussiness_scop = #{record.bussinessScop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bussiness_area_title = #{record.bussinessAreaTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bussiness_area_code = #{record.bussinessAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ = #{record.organ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_text = #{record.signText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`state` = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pub_time = #{record.pubTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_evidence = #{record.payEvidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update org_licence set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_period = #{record.operatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fee = #{record.fee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, privilege_level = #{record.privilegeLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bussiness_scop = #{record.bussinessScop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bussiness_area_title = #{record.bussinessAreaTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bussiness_area_code = #{record.bussinessAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ = #{record.organ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_text = #{record.signText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pub_time = #{record.pubTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_evidence = #{record.payEvidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update org_licence
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_period = #{operatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=BIGINT},
privilege_level = #{privilegeLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bussiness_scop = #{bussinessScop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bussiness_area_title = #{bussinessAreaTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bussiness_area_code = #{bussinessAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ = #{organ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_text = #{signText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pub_time = #{pubTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_evidence = #{payEvidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update org_licence set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_period = #{operatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, privilege_level = #{privilegeLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bussiness_scop = #{bussinessScop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bussiness_area_title = #{bussinessAreaTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bussiness_area_code = #{bussinessAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ = #{organ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_text = #{signText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pub_time = #{pubTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_evidence = #{payEvidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from org_licence order by pub_time asc limit #{offset},#{limit}
select * from org_licence where organ in (select la.id from org_la la,org_isp isp where la.isp=isp.id and isp.id=#{isp}) order by pub_time asc limit #{offset},#{limit}

select licence.* from org_isp isp, org_la la, org_licence licence where isp.id=la.isp and licence.privilege_level=0 and licence.organ=la.id and isp.id in (${isps}) order by licence.pub_time desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
